column2: That's right, coward, run back to [From.Capital.GetName]!
column3: C'est ça, couard, retourne à [From.Capital.GetName]!

column2: You turn to face [From.GetTitle] [From.GetFirstName]... and [From.GetSheHe] breaks [From.GetHerHis] charge and flees. You pursue, but lose track of [From.GetHerHim] in the chaos.
column3: Vous vous retournez pour faire face à [From.GetTitle] [From.GetFirstName] lorsqu'… [From.GetSheHe] stoppe sa charge et s'enfuit. Vous le(a) poursuivez, mais perdez sa trace dans le chaos des combats.

column2: That's right, coward, run back to [From.Capital.GetName]!
column3: C'est ça, couard, retourne à [From.Capital.GetName]!

column2: [From.GetBestName]'s death demoralizes the enemy!
column3: La mort de [From.GetBestName] démoralise les ennemis!

column2: As [FromFrom.GetBestName] falls before you, [FromFrom.GetHerHis] soldiers look on and begin to lose hope.
column3: Alors que vous venez de défaire [FromFrom.GetBestName], ses soldats commence à douter et à perdre espoir.

column2: Now's our chance!
column3: C'est notre chance!

column2: You take [From.GetBestName] prisoner.
column3: Vous détenez [From.GetBestName] prisonnier.

column2: [FromFrom.GetBestName] lies helpless at your feet, [FromFrom.GetHerHis] weapon discarded and yours at [FromFrom.GetHerHis] throat.
column3: [FromFrom.GetBestName] est étendu impuissant à vos pieds, son arme brisée et la votre à sa gorge.

column2: Come with me, and walk fast. It's a long way to [Root.Capital.GetName].
column3: Venez avec moi, et marchez rapidement. Le chemin est long jusqu'à [Root.Capital.GetName].

column2: You are defeated. [From.GetBestName] takes you prisoner.
column3: Vous êtes défait. [From.GetBestName] vous garde prisonnier.

column2: I'll remember this, [From.GetOnlyDynastyName].
column3: Je m'en souviendrai, [From.GetOnlyDynastyName].

column2: Your respect among the various clans has increased!
Hail the Lord!
Your respect among the priests and bishops has increased!
This was not a Just act!
column4: Das war kein rechtmäßiger Akt!

column2: Oh well
column4: Nun ja

column2: This was not an Honest act!
column4: Das war kein ehrlicher Akt!

column2: This was not a Kind act!
column4: Das war kein gütiger Akt!

column2: Gain §R5§! Tyranny\n
column4: Erhalte §R5§! Tyrannei\n

column2: Gain §R10§! Tyranny\n
column4: Erhalte §R10§! Tyrannei\n

column2: Gain §R15§! Tyranny\n
column4: Erhalte §R15§! Tyrannei\n

column2: Gain §R20§! Tyranny\n
column4: Erhalte §R20§! Tyrannei\n

column2: Gain §R30§! Tyranny\n
column4: Erhalte §R30§! Tyrannei\n

column2: Gain §R40§! Tyranny\n
column4: Erhalte §R40§! Tyrannei\n

column2: Another province returned to the righteous Old Ways under my rule!

After the enemy charge the clang of the bows and the shouts of the combatants mixed fearfully with the sound of the trumpets, and drowned the groans of the many good men who fell, and lay rolling defenceless beneath the feet of the horses. The splendid armour our knights is now defaced with dust and blood, and gives way at every stroke of the sword and battle-axe..
We are broken!
Charge, men, charge!

The Beit haMikdash has been Rebuilt! A new Cohen Gadol can now take his proper place on the Temple Mount in our holy capital Jerusalem! It is time to rejoice such an happy and meaningful day for Judaism, and of course let the name of the ruler who built it never get lost in history!
Baruch haShem!
War Sanction not Granted
War Sanction Granted
Your lover, [From.GetFirstName], just informed you that her newborn baby has your eyes..
No one needs to know this!
The Cohen haGadol has accepted our offers for a sacrifice on the altar of the Third Temple!
Baruch haShem!

As soon as I rose to rightfully hold my titles, my Chancellor reminded me the urgency for a commendation ceremony to be held in [Root.Capital.GetName] in front of all my fellow vassals and feudal lords who will, one by one, swear fealty and loyalty to me as their rightful ruler. As for the ones who will refuse to pay homage, there will be a different sort of treatment..
Send out emissaries to the lords of the realm

My liege, [From.GetTitledName], will hold a commendation ceremony soon. My feudal duties command me to attend the ceremony and swear fealty to [From.GetHerHim], otherwise the consenquences might be dire..
I'll become 'the man'!
I won't bend my knee!
[From.GetTitledName] refused to attend the commendation ceremony and hence swear fealty to your noble and enlightened rule!
Argh!
[From.GetTitledName] will pay for this outrage! TO WAR!
The Commendation Ceremony

All my vassal appeared bareheaded and weaponless as a sign of their submission to my will and knelt before me. They then, one by one, clasped their hands before me and stretched their clasped hands outward. I grasped their hands between my own, they  announced they wished to become 'the man', and I accepted their fealty. They then placed their hands on a Bible, and swore: 'I promise on my faith that I will in the future be faithful to the lord, never cause [From.GetHerHim] harm and will observe my homage to [From.GetHerHim] completely against all persons in good faith and without deceit.'
Such a grand ceremony!

By the Lord before whom this Bible is holy, I will to [From.GetTitledFirstName] be true and faithful, and love all which [From.GetSheHe] loves and shun all which [From.GetSheHe] shuns, according to the laws of God and the order of the world. Nor will I ever with will or action, through word or deed, do anything which is unpleasing to [From.GetHerHim], on condition that [From.GetSheHe] will hold to me as I shall deserve it, and that [From.GetSheHe] will perform everything as it was in our agreement when I submitted myself to [From.GetHerHim] and chose [From.GetHerHis] will.
I swear!

I didn't swear fealty to my liege yet, and as the official commendation ceremony was attended by my predecessor and not by me, my feudal obligations require me to ride to [Root.Liege.Capital.GetName] and pay homage to my ruler as soon as possible.
I'll become 'the man'!
I won't bend my knee!
My vassal [From.GetTitledFirstName] has just arrived to [Root.Capital.GetName] to bend the knee to my rule!
A wise choice!
[From.GetTitledName] refused to swear fealty to your noble and enlightened rule!
ARGH!
[From.GetTitledName] will pay for this outrage! TO WAR!
My liege [From.GetTitledName] just sent me an envoy with a declaration of war against my 'unlawful' and 'unholy' rule after I decided not to swear fealty to [From.GetHerHim]!
TO ARMS!!

With getting involved in my current war against my former liege, I broke the oath of fealty I swore long ago. Now everyone will see me as an oathbreaker, and my former liege will be mad as hell when words of this will start to spread around, not being angry enough about the oathbreaking..
The end justifies the means, I guess
[From.GetTitledName] has broken the oath of fealty [From.GetSheHeCap] swore me! What an unlawful bastard, this is an unbelievable dishonour for both [From.GetHerHim] and the realm as a whole!
It will not go unpunished

When the chaplain told you [FromFrom.GetFirstName] was looking for you, you weren't sure what to expect. Certainly, you weren't expecting to find [FromFrom.GetHerHim] wearing a purple gown and hat! 'Father,' [FromFrom.GetSheHe] tells you, with a new look of pride and ambition upon his face, '[From.GetBestName] has named me Cardinal of the Holy See!'
Do House [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] proud, [FromFrom.GetFirstName].
column3: Je suis si fier de lui!

column2: WHAT?! Why wasn't I informed of this?!
column3: QUOI?! Personne de m'a consulté!

column2: The Pope has just died! A Conclave will soon be held to elect his successor.
May he rest in peace
House [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] deserves a Pope!

Annuntio vobis gaudium magnum: Habemus Papam! Eminentissimum ac reverendissimum Dominum, Dominum [From.GetFirstName] Sanctæ Romanæ Ecclesiæ Cardinalem [From.GetOnlyDynastyName], Qui sibi nomen imposuit [From.GetTitledName].
He won't forget my support for his papal bid

Annuntio vobis gaudium magnum: Habemus Papam! Eminentissimum ac reverendissimum Dominum, Dominum [From.GetFirstName] Sanctæ Romanæ Ecclesiæ Cardinalem [From.GetOnlyDynastyName], Qui sibi nomen imposuit [From.GetTitledName].
[From.GetTitledName] won't be so happy to hear we supported another's bid..

Annuntio vobis gaudium magnum: Habemus Papam! Eminentissimum ac reverendissimum Dominum, [From.GetFirstName] Sanctæ Romanæ Ecclesiæ Cardinalem [From.GetOnlyDynastyName], qui sibi nomen imposuit [From.GetTitledName].
May God bless [From.GetTitledName]!

The guards drag [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] up from [From.GetHerHis] cell and throw [From.GetHerHim] at your feet. 'I've come for justice,' [From.GetSheHe] says, 'By the rights of the law of this realm, I demand a trial by combat to be fought against you, to prove my innocence of your slanderous accusations!'
I won't fight. [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] will stand for the [Root.GetTitle]
Sharpen my sword..
No. I won't fall to his tricks! Return the prisoner to the cells!
In an outrageous contravention of an ancient law and custom, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has denied you a trial by combat to disprove your alleged crimes!
He will regret this!
I have been chosen to represent [From.GetTitledName] and the honour of the realm and its laws in a trial by combat against [FromFromFrom.GetName].
I will honour [From.GetHimHer] and the realm!
[From.GetBestName] steps forward. 'I'll stand for you, [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA], and for the honour of the realm and its laws!'
Fight well [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
So, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has accepted my demand for a trial by combat, but instead of fighting himself he has sent forth his marshal.. The trial begins!
En Garde!
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has decreed the start of the trial. Single combat with [From.GetBestName] to the death it shall be...
En Garde!
[FromFrom.GetFirstName] [FromFrom.GetOnlyDynastyName] lies dead at the hands of [From.GetBestName], [FromFrom.GetHerHis] final plan failed.
Perfect

You watch in horror as [FromFrom.GetBestName] falls to the floor, [From.GetFirstName] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName]'s sword in [FromFrom.GetHerHis] chest. The prisoner takes [FromFrom.GetHerHis] leave, walking out the doors with a smile on [FromFrom.GetHerHis] face as the entire court looks on in disbelief.
This can't be happening!
will be outraged at your denial of his rights
You will fight against [This.GetTitledFirstName] himself
You fight against [This.GetBestName]
[This.GetBestName] will fight gainst [From.GetBestName]
[This.GetBestName] will fight against [FromFrom.GetBestName]
Your captor and accuser, [Root.Host.GetBestName], will hear your demand for a trial by combat
Any coward can fight a battle when he's sure of winning, but give me the man who has pluck to fight when he's sure of losing. That's my way, sir. And there are many victories worse than a defeat.
Retreat!
To Victory!

Hark! I hear the tramp of thousands, and of armed men the hum Lo! A nation's hosts have gathered Round the quick alarming drum saying: Come, Freemen, Come! Ere your heritage be wasted, said the quick alarming drum. The enemy charges!
Men, fall back!
They shall not pass!

In peace, there's nothing so becomes a man as modest stillness and humility, but when the blast of war blows in our ears, then imitate the action of the tiger: stiffen the sinews, summon up the blood, disguise fair nature with hard-favour'd rage.
Stand Still!
Up Guards and at 'em!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has somehow survived the slaughter! But it seems that for now all [From.GetSheHe] cares about is staying well safe locked up at [From.GetHerHis] castle..
Craven to the bone!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has somehow survived the slaughter! And the bad news are not over: as soon as [From.GetSheHe] got back to [From.GetHerHis] castle, [From.GetSheHe] raised [From.GetHerHis] levies and is now marching towards us!
The bastard! TO ARMS!!

[From.GetTitledFirstName] lies dead on the great hall's blood covered floor, [From.GetHerHis] throat slit by one of my assassins. Together with [From.GetHerHim] lie [From.GetHerHis] personal guard and entourage, all slaughtered on the way of vengeance.
[From.GetSheHe] should have thought twice before betraying me!
I'm too busy

Through my sources I have learned that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] will be visiting his favourite courtesan at the local brothel in [Root.PlotTarget.Location.GetName] sometimes in the next weeks. The guards will keep a close watch on the streets, but will they expect an assassin to come from the inside?
My co-conspirators will find a good man...
Hire an assassin
I know just the man for this job...
This isn't a good idea after all
I decided to visit my favourite courtesan at [Root.Location.GetName], but as soon as I got to her room I found an hooded man waiting for me with a knife in his hand and a wry smile on his face..
My God. He's going to kill me!
Run!
Attempt to kill [This.GetTitledFirstName] when he will visit his favourite courtesan sometimes in the next weeks.
The man reaches me before I can react, and his knife slits open my throat..
This was no madman. [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] orchestrated this!
Argh...

The hooded figure charged at me with his knife still, but thanks to what must surely have been the intervention of [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], I miraculously managed to get an hold of my sword and slain him!
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has conspired to kill me!
Who was he working for?

[From.GetTitledFirstName] has let me know that the plot to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledFirstName] is proceeding well. [From.PlotTarget.GetSubjectPronounCap] will soon be assassinated while visiting his favourite courtesan in [From.PlotTarget.Location.GetName].
Success! [From.GetTitledFirstName] was killed by the assassin we sent over at the brothel. Unfortunately, he was caught and blame spilled my name under torture.
Success! [From.GetTitledFirstName] was killed by the assassin we sent over at the brothel. The story we concocted about a 'hateful madman' seems to be working perfectly.
One less threat to the establishment.
Failure! [From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to fight back and kill our assassin, who deliriously made my name before dying..
Go to damage control!
Failure! [From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to fight back and kill our assassin, but at least he died before he could talk and the conspiracy remains uncovered.

[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] will soon be going on an hunting trip with his entourage and his personal guard. With boars and other dangerous beasts running around, not to mention arrows flying in every direction, so many things could go wrong during a hunt...
My co-conspirators will bribe a hunter...
Bribe an hunter
I have some leverage on one of the hunters...
The hunting trip is going well, together many other skilled hunters you will be getting into the wild soon!
I can't wait!
Why is that hunter so nervous?
Arrange for [This.GetTitledFirstName] to perish in a hunting accident.

One of your hunters tracks a boar and gives you the first shot. As quietly as possible, you draw your bow, take aim and send an arrow into the small animal's flank. Filled with satisfaction you turn around, only to see the hunter aiming his own bow at you, fully drawn. '[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] sends his regards,' he whispers before sending the arrow into your throat.
Gghh... [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] got to you...
W-why?

As the hunter's behavior becomes increasingly nervous and erratic you decide to confront him about it. Finally he breaks and admits to having been paid a handsome sum to kill you during the hunt and make it look like an accident.
So you were paid by [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]...
And you say you never saw the face of your employer?

[From.GetTitledName] has let me know that the plot to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] is proceeding well. A hunter going with him on a trip to the wilds has been generously bribed to cause a tragic hunting accident.

Success! The hunter did what he was paid for and made sure [From.GetTitledFirstName] never returned from the hunting trip. Unfortunately, he later lost his nerve and told everyone willing to listen about my involvement as he drank away his sorrows.

Success! The hunter did what he was paid for and made sure [From.GetTitledFirstName] never returned from the hunting trip. He will keep quiet about his ghastly deed to save his own skin if nothing else.
To hunt a man is truly the greatest sport...

Failure! That fool hunter lost his nerve and failed to kill [From.GetTitledFirstName]! What is more, he told the [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] everything about the conspiracy - including my involvement!
I knew we couldn't trust him!
Failure! That fool hunter lost his nerve and failed to kill [From.GetTitledFirstName]! At least he has decided to keep quiet about the conspiracy to hide the shame of his own involvement.

[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] will soon be going to visit one of [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] most powerful friends in [Root.PlotTarget.Location.GetName]. [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] thinks that no one else other than the little guard [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe] will bring along and [Root.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] friend know about this trip. [Root.PlotTarget.GetSheHe]'s wrong, we know the route and we could ambush their party in an alley we made sure they will have to walk through..
My co-conspirators will find the right thugs...
Bribe thugs
I know some men for the job...

The trip is going well, we almost reached our destination when we come through an obstacle on the main street. 'There is an alley I know that leads right past this block' a guard says. As soon as you enter the alley a strange whistle is heard and the air is suddenly filled with flying bolts and arrows. Cloaked figures seem to rise out of nowhere and the air becomes heavy with battle... It's an ambush!
Argh!
Men, to me!
Arrange for [This.GetTitledFirstName] to perish in an ambush.
The ambushers have the best of you and your men, and leave you slain in the alley.
Et tu, [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], fili mi?
Et tu, Brute, fili mi?

As the worst of the ambush seems to fade away, I'm able to re-organize my men and fight back the attackers until they retreat! One of them is left behind with a mortal wound, and before he dies I'm able to grasp a few words.
[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]... [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]...
Ghhghh

[From.GetTitledName] has let me know that the plot to kill [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] is proceeding well. An ambush has been set to take place soon and ensure [From.PlotTarget.GetHerHis] departure from this world-

Success! The ambushers easily overcame and slaughtered [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetHerHis] guards. Unfortunately, one of the men involved later lost his senses and told everyone willing to listen about my involvement as he drank and fucked away his pay in a brothel.

Success! The ambushers easily overcame and slaughtered [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetHerHis] guards. They also managed to get away unnoticed, and the blame fell on one of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s many other enemies.
Perfect
Failure! [From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to fight back our ambushers, leaving many of them dead or fatally wounded. One of them deliriously made my name before dying..
Damn!

Failure! [From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to fight back our ambushers, leaving many of them dead or fatally wounded. Thankfully they all died before they could talk, so the conspiracy remains uncovered.

For as long as have ruled here we have entrusted the raising of our children to Langobardisch and Greek nursemaids. Our first words would not be in our native tongue but in German or Greek. As we grew up we learned to speak a tongue that was neither one nor the other. Now is this time to make this tongue our own so we may all communicate.
Yes, let us be one with our serfs

Around our lands more people are using this 'Neapolitan' language and I find this is a perfect means for a Neapolitan overlord to get his Greek and Langobardisch serfs to work properly. We continue to use our own influence to promote this means of communication in the interests of more efficient realm.
We are indeed wise
This new Neapolitan language does have a certain functionality. I have therefore prevailed upon a member of my court to adopt this for everyday administrative use.
A most useful development

I was considering important business when I had an amazing insight. To strengthen my realm I must bring my vassals round to my way of thinking. This involves communication. If I can get them to communicate like me then I will have a much smoother running realm.
Sometimes I even surprise myself
My Liege has persuded me to embrace this notion of Neapolitanness that is sweeping the realm.
Now, who ate my babà?

For as long as have ruled here we have entrusted the raising of our children to Greek nursemaids. Our first words would not be in our native tongue but in Greek. As we grew up we learned to speak a tongue that was neither one nor the other. Now is this time to make this tongue our own so we may all communicate.
Yes, let us be one with our serfs

Around our lands more people are using this 'Southern Italian' language and I find this is a perfect means for a Southern Italian overlord to get his Greek serfs to work properly. We continue to use our own influence to promote this means of communication in the interests of more efficient realm.
We are indeed wise
This new Southern Italian language does have a certain functionality. I have therefore prevailed upon a member of my court to adopt this for everyday administrative use.
A most useful development

I was considering important business when I had an amazing insight. To strengthen my realm I must bring my vassals round to my way of thinking. This involves communication. If I can get them to communicate like me then I will have a much smoother running realm.
Sometimes I even surprise myself
My Liege has persuded me to embrace this notion of Southern Italianness that is sweeping the realm.
Now, let's dance a tarantella!
The sack of Aachen

Even Aachen, the former seat of Charlemagne's great Carolingian empire, has fallen under the grasps of our power. The city's riches are now being looted by our men with the order to bring them to the capital immediatly.
There's a lot to plunder!
The sack of Paris

We were finally able to break the siege of Paris and sacked the city. The still unfinished Notre Dame Cathedral is quickly set on fire and with the light provided by the rest of the burning city, our men can continue looting and murdering well into the night.
So many riches!
The sack of London

No sea nor land has proved a formidable enough barrier to halt our advance. London has fallen, and the city is now the scene of a savage looting and slaughter on a scale unrivaled since the days of Queen Boudica and her rebellion.
Sack the city!
The sack of Rome

We have breached the Aurelian Walls, and our armies are now on the field of the Circus Maximus while we set up camp on the Palatine Hill. No mercy will be shown to those Romans who have not yet fled the city, or paid with all their riches. It is the direness of war.
Veni, Vidi, Vici
The sack of Venice

Venice is ours! The canals have been blocked by the bloated corpses of the dead as the city is sacked by our frenzied soldiers. Those few fortunate enough to have escaped the slaughter are now claiming the bodies are packed tightly enough in the Venetian Lagoon for one to ride to and from the mainland as he pleases. The razing continues..
There is no force in the decrees of Venice
The sack of Constantinople

The Theodosian Walls have not been enough to spare Constantinople from being taken. The great imperial capital has been sacked, its citizens butchered, its women raped, the Hagia Sophia defiled and the Great Palace of the emperors put to the torch. And it's inestimable riches are now on their way to our capital and treasury..
Silent leges inter arma
The sack of Lisbon
Lisbon has fallen! While the city burns at our touch, I look out over the great blue expanse of the Atlantic. Who can stop us now?
No place is beyond our reach
The sack of Prague

The city of Prague has become a beacon of light in an otherwise dark world, as the Mongol barbarians move from house to house and set fire to everything not yet looted. A flood of refugees spread horrific tales about the cruelty of the bloodthirsty Tartar horsemen to every corner of Europe.
Have they no regard for culture?
The sack of Vienna

Vienna, a city of growing importance on the Danube river, has fallen to our army. The smoking ruins and butchered corpses we left behind after the sack do not lend much faith in the city's immediate future prospects.
Pro aris et focis!
The sack of Esztergom

The Hungarian city of Esztergom has fallen to our hands and is now the scene of indiscriminate pillage and slaughter. As the sack goes on, those few remaining soldiers that attempt to flee on foot are cut down without mercy by our vanguards as dark, billowing smoke rises towards the sky above the city.
Ostendite modo bellum, pacem habebitis
The sack of Athens

The ancient city of Athens has fallen to our hands, and we can now rampage unchecked behind its walls. Great monuments and artifacts dating back to the dawn of Western Civilization are stolen or lost forever in a cultural desecration that will surely be felt by future generations thousands of years from now. The riches accumulated by our men will surely be enormous..
This time they have gone too far!
The sack of Belgrade

The 'White City' has turned red as we breached Belgrade's walls and massacred its guards and inhabitants without exception. After several days of slaughter and looting, the smell of death and rotting flesh proves too much even for the most endured soldier to bear, as we move on with many of the city's riches in our coffers..
War its thousands slays, but peace its ten thousands
The sack of Baghdad

The great city of Baghdad, one of the world's foremost centers of learning, has succumbed to our great army after a siege. Nothing can now stop us from what announces itself to be a wonderous pillage. The Tigris river runs not only red with blood, but black with the ink of priceless and irreplaceable tomes from the House of Wisdom and the city's other great libraries.
The brazen throat of war
The sack of Damascus

Damascus, the ancient City of Jasmine, has been sacked by our armies. Some of our most frenzied men have gathered a colossal pile of severed heads of civilians and enemy soldiers alike on a field just outside the city walls, now renamed 'burj al-ru'us' by the massacre's few survivors - the Tower of Heads.
Only the dead have seen the end of war
The sack of Jerusalem

We were finally able to break the siege and conquer Jerusalem! As we pillaged and slaughtered, many of the inhabitants sought shelter in the Al-Aqsa Mosque, the Dome of the Rock, and the Temple Mount. Our soldiers were killing and slaying even to the Temple of Solomon, where the slaughte rwas so great that it is said that our men were wading in blood up to their ankles..
Death is not a punishment, but the end of it
The sack of Alexandria

After taking the city by force, our ranks swept through the city like hungry falcons attacking a flight of doves, with loose reins and victorious faces, murdering and spreading terror. Beds and cushions made of gold and encrusted with jewels were cut to pieces with knives and torn to shreds. Those hiding inside their homes were dragged through the streets and alleys, each of them becoming a plaything, as the population dies at our hands.
May they suffer an eternity of pain!
The sack of Cairo

Riding through the fertile Nile Delta, we have arrived at the Great Pyramids of Giza and breached the gates of Cairo. Surely even the strongest Pharaoh would be given pause by the pain and misery now inflicted on the city's guard and population, and by the raging pillage that is taking place in the aftermaths..
Vae Victis
The sack of Mecca

The Holy City of Mecca now burns at the cruel touch of the Mongol infidels. Pilgrims journeying from distant lands to show their submission to Allah are met only with death when approaching the city gates. This unforgivable desecration will be remembered for ages to come.
Not a single infidel taking part in this affront will escape justice
Victory is not ours yet. Charge at the enemy with full strength, may it lead us to glory, or to a glorious death. Shame for the ones who break, honour to the brave!
Retreat! Order the men to fall back, as it's not time to win or lose this battle just yet. Although many commanders will see this choice as craven, I know better..
The enemy charges, but victory isn't lost yet. Hold on and counter-attack with what strength we have left: may it lead us to glory in victory, or to a glorious death in battle!
I was finally able to pull all the needed threads for the conspiracy to get started!
A desperate disease requires a dangerous remedy
Dear [Root.GetTitledFirstName], the conspiracy is in motion. [Root.GetTitledFirstName]
Thrilling news

The conspiracy goes on: One of my associates has pointed out that we need some support from the inside in order for my masterplan to be successful. Although I agree with him, there are many paths I could follow..
Diplomacy is the path
Scheming is the way
I trust only steel

[Root.GetTitledFirstName], It appears we both have similar concerns against [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] and to that end I propose we establish a relationship where we could both benefit.

 Regards,
[From.GetFirstName] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName]
If the money is right..
Interesting, I will think about it
I won't get involved in such business
This is treason!

[Root.GetTitledFirstName], Your proposal is most intriguing. I think a fair amount of gold would convince me to be part of this conspiracy.

 Regards,
 [From.GetTitledFirstName]
Give [From.GetHerHim] what he wants
[From.GetSheHe] asks too much

[Root.GetTitledFirstName], You and your agents make a convincing argument, but alas I am unsure. I will have to ponder before I can be sure this is the right thing to do.

 Regards,
 [From.GetTitledFirstName]
Some gold should convince [From.GetHerHim]
Keep trying to persuade [From.GetHerHim]
Forget it
will receive your gift and respond
will continue to be cajoled

[Root.GetTitledFirstName], I'm afraid I don't see eye to eye with you on this, I will not be part of this conspiracy. Be thankful that I choose not to speak of this attempted treachery.

 Regards,
 [From.GetTitledFirstName]
Loyalty, such a foreign word to my ears
We need to cut out the loose ends
Grave news, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has informed [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] of your treachery!
Argh!
[From.GetSheHe] will pay for this!

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA], I regret to inform you that [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] has attempted to bribe their way into my loyalty in order to conspire against your life and titles. I'm sure you appreciate me telling you as soon as this dishonourable proposal was presented to me. 

 Regards,
 [From.GetTitledFirstName]
Treason!

[Root.GetTitledFirstName], I'm glad we have a common interest in this matter, here is a gift as a token of my goodwill. 

 Regards,
 [From.GetTitledFirstName]
I'm convinced
This is just too risky

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s agents continue to cajole me, in order to try and win my support for their plot. They do make some convincing arguments to conspire with [From.GetHerHim], but they want my commitment soon.

[Root.GetTitledFirstName],
  I have decided that working together in your conspiracy's interest is the right thing to do. My loyalty is yours to this end. 

 Regards,
 [From.GetTitledFirstName]
[From.GetSheHeCap] is most wise

[Root.GetTitledFirstName], I have decided that conspiring with you is not in my best interest. I do not want to be approached by your agents again.

 Regards,
 [From.GetTitledFirstName]
Damn!

[Root.GetTitledFirstName], you are most wise, here is your gift as requested. I hope our relationship will be fruitful. 

 Regards,
 [From.GetTitledFirstName]
So much gold!

[Root.GetTitledFirstName], I have decided that having you on the conspiracy is not in our best interests after all. 

 Regards,
 [From.GetTitledFirstName]
As you wish..
I'm supporting a perilous conspiracy against my lord. This is a very risky state of affairs..
Some more gold would make me feel more safe
I cannot risk this any longer

[Root.GetTitledFirstName], if you want me to keep being part of the conspiracy against [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] I request a higher pay, as my role inside it has greatly increased after the last developments

 Regards,
 [From.GetTitledFirstName]
I don't think so

[Root.GetTitledFirstName], I'm afraid this conspiracy has become too risky and that I cannot be part of this conspiracy any longer. I hope you understand. 

 Regards,
 [From.GetTitledFirstName]
But we had an arrangement!

[Root.GetTitledFirstName], I have decided that your part in our conspiracy is most valuable now more than ever and that extra compensation is indeed due to you. 

 Regards,
 [From.GetTitledFirstName]

[Root.GetTitledFirstName], I have decided that our 'relationship' is not actually worth the price you set upon it, and your role in the conspiracy terminates as of now. You know what will happen to you if anyone will ever hear anything of this. \n\n [From.GetTitledFirstName]

Rumors are that the actual romantic life of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] isn't in the most orthodox of states, with a lustful triangle with [Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] spouse and one or more lovers involved taking place. My conspiracy could greatly benefit from this situation, as long as we contact the right party.
Have my agents contact [Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] spouse
Have my agents contact [Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] lover

Now that we have ears and eyes in [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s bedchamber, we learned that [Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] lover and spouse are bitterly quarreling over [Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] favour now more than ever before. If [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] was to be found dead in such a situation, the blame would certainly go to either one of them.
[Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] spouse will arrange things for us
[Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] lover will arrange things for us
We will arrange things ourselves and let the blame fall on either of them
It's not a good idea

[Root.GetTitledFirstName], we have planned the assassination of [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]. We know you could be most useful to us, especially in getting our man inside [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s bedchambers, and in the aftermath, in letting the blame fall on one of [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s many enemies.
I know of a certain secret passage that leads to the bedchamber..
This is not what we agreed on, I will tell [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]!
This is not what we agreed on, I want more gold
This is not what we agreed on, I want a title when things are set
I can't do this, I'm out

[Root.GetTitledFirstName], if you want my help to assassinate [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] I request a title when things are set, as my role inside it has greatly increased after the last developments

 Regards,
 [From.GetTitledFirstName]
Fine

[Root.GetTitledFirstName], I have decided that your part in our conspiracy is most valuable now more than ever and that extra compensation in the form of a title and the conservation of your current status is indeed due to you. 

 Regards,
 [From.GetTitledFirstName]

Everything is set for the assassination: my man will go and infiltrate inside [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s bedchambers late at night, when we know [Root.PlotTarget.GetSubjectPronoun] will be meeting [Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] lover. After the deed is done, our man will leave clear proof of [Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] spouse involvement in the room, and the knife he will be using to assassinate the couple in [Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] spouse's chambers.
[Root.PlotTarget.GetSubjectPronoun] will feel a thousand deaths, in fearing one
This isn't such a good idea after all

Everything is set for the assassination: my man will go and infiltrate inside [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s bedchambers late at night, when we know [Root.PlotTarget.GetSubjectPronoun] will be in a deep sleep and unguarded. After the deed is done, our man will leave clear proof of one of [Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] lovers' involvement in the room.

As I approach my bedchambers, I find [Root.Lover.GetBestName] naked waiting for me on the bed. I start getting undressed and in the arousement I don't notice the quick steps coming from behind me until it's too late. With a face full of terror [Root.Lover.GetBestName] falls under a dozen stabs, as another hooded figure runs towards me with the intent of slitting my throat..
Guards!

[Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName] has been murdered together with [From.Spouse.GetHerHis] lover, and I have been blamed for it! Apparently the knife used for the murder was found in my bedchamber, together with a letter proving my involvement in the deed.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] lies dead on [From.GetHerHis] bedchamber's blood covered floor together with [From.Lover.GetBestName], their throat slit by my assassins.
Just as I planned
Time to send the heir an ultimatum
Tell the bought marshal to get his men ready
[From.GetTitledFirstName] somehow managed to elude my assassins!
Damn!

As I'm in deep sleep in my bedchambers, I don't notice the quick steps coming from the door towards me until it's too late. As I'm finally awaken and I open my eyes I see an hooded figure running towards me, knife at hand.
Guards!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] lies dead on [From.GetHerHis] bedchamber's blood covered floor, [From.GetHerHis] throat slit by my assassins.

My Chancellor just delivered me a letter from [From.GetTitledFirstName], telling me to consider well what was written there. It goes: 'For far too long you and your family have blocked my God-given right to rule the [Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullBaseName]. Recognize my rightful claim and step down peacefully or meet me sword in hand. Rest assure that I have enough supporters to obtain this either way, as your late predecessor might have noticed. You surely don't want to end up like that.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]'

Rather than risking civil war tearing the realm apart, I have decided to give in to your demand and hand my title over to you. But this treacherous act of blackmail will not be forgotten...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
You will be, though

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s agents just delivered me a very important missive. So it goes: It's time to act. Gather the troops loyal to you under my banner, and together we will overthrow [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] and take the realm. 


[From.GetTitledName]
Consider it done
I will do it for a title and the martialship
I'm out
[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s marshal has gathered the troops loyal to him and is now waiting for my orders.
Storm the castle and bring [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] to me alive
Storm the castle and kill [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]
Take the capital while [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] is away

Treason! [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] has gathered troops loyal to him underneath [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s banner and is now storming the castle! [From.GetSheHeCap] wants to capture me and usurp the throne!
Guards! To Arms!
Victory! Our troops have succesfully stormed the castle and captured [From.GetTitledFirstName]. The throne is now mine!
Excellent
May our luck be damned! [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s loyal troops were able to hold off our men and kill the marshal in the process. We are now in open war!
To arms!

Treason! [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] has gathered troops loyal to him underneath [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s banner and is now storming the castle! [From.GetSheHeCap] wants to kill me and usurp the throne!
Guards! To Arms!
Victory! Our troops have succesfully taken [From.Capital.GetName] and slain [From.GetTitledFirstName]. The throne is now mine!
Excellent!
With the help of our inside connections, I was able to get a claim on the [Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullBaseName].
Perfect

Treason! [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] has gathered troops loyal to him underneath [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s banner and is now attacking [Root.Capital.GetName]! [From.GetSheHeCap] wants to usurp the throne while I'm away!
Hopefully most of the guards will stay loyal to me
Victory! Our troops have succesfully taken the capital! The throne is now mine!
Grand!
There is one last piece to settle..
[Root.Capital.GetName] has fallen to [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s treasonous army and [From.GetSheHe] has seized the throne!
Argh!
To arms!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has declared war on you after you seized the capital and the throne!
I'll crush [From.GetHerHim]!
After I chose to switch to [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s side, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] welcomed me to [From.GetHerHis] court.
This is my place now

Seeing [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] with [Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] nose deep in the cup at a feast last month, it suddenly struck me that all I need to get rid of [Root.PlotTarget.GetObjectPronoun] is a fine poison...
My associates will provide the poison
Buy a rare poison
Hemlock goes well with the Red...
Success! [From.GetTitledName] died of the poisoned wine. Unfortunately, my complicity was discovered.
Fling but a stone, the giant dies.
Time for war!
Success! It seems the wine did not agree with [From.GetTitledName]. [From.GetSubjectPronounCap] died not knowing the name of [From.GetPossPronoun] killer.
Death is a black camel, which kneels at the gates of all.
[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s realm is currently at war, a perfect occasion for my conspiracy to get in motion.

I've just learned that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] will be visiting an important merchant in the capital soon. No one knows what route [Root.PlotTarget.GetSubjectPronoun] will take, except from [Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] spymaster. If I got to know it as well, an ambush could be easily set.
Contact the bought spymaster immediatly

[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s agents just delivered me a very important missive. So it goes: It's time to act, I need to know the route [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s carriage will take during [From.PlotTarget.GetSubjectPronoun] forthcoming visit to one of the most important merchants of the capital.  


[From.GetTitledName]
I want a title and the spymaster position

[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s spymaster has told me the route that [Root.PlotTarget.GetSubjectPronoun] will take when visiting an important merchant in [Root.Capital.GetName] next week. Now everything is ready to set an ambush..
My men will be in position

Success! The ambushers easily overcame and slaughtered [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetHerHis] guards. Thanks to the spymaster's involvement, they also managed to get away unnoticed, and the blame fell on one of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s many other enemies.

The tyrant [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s time is up. With [Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun]'s marshal on my side, I could easily seize the throne if something was to happen to [Root.PlotTarget.GetObjectPronoun]. Most of the capital's guards and army estates are already in the conspiracy, and it would be easy to get one of them to do the deed for us.
Contact the marshal immediatly

[From.GetTitledName]'s agents just contacted me with a decisive missing: 'The tyrant [From.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s time is up. We need one of your men in [From.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] personal guard to do the deed. In the meanwhile, rally the troops loyal to us and get them ready to seize the capital as soon as word of [From.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] death will spread.'
The Captain of the guard is one of us
This will earn me more than some gratitude
I'm not going to be part of this

Everything is ready for the final threads to be pulled: [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s marshal has rallied the men loyal to our cause under our banners just outside the capital, and the captain of [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s personal guard will turn his cloak and assassinate [Root.PlotTarget.GetObjectPronoun] as soon as I give word to the marshal to attack.
Carpe diem!

The enemy is at the gates! [From.GetTitledName]'s and [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName] armies combined together under [From.GetTitledName]'s banner are now marching towards the capital, in a treasonous attempt to seize my throne! As I turn towards my guard's captain to order him to prepare for battle, he swiftly sheathes his sword with the intention of swinging it towards my neck!
Et tu, Brute? Fall [Root.GetTitledName]!

The assassination failed! [From.GetTitledName] was only wounded by the guard captain, who was then slain by the guards loyal to [From.GetHerHim]. Apparently we miscalculated the support we had among their ranks, and now the secrecy of our intent is compromised.
It's war now

Victory! Our man has succesfully slain [From.GetTitledFirstName], and as soon as word of [From.GetHerHis] death reached the capital, we were welcomed as liberators by the cheers of the smallfolk and nobles alike! The throne is mine!

I was miraculously able to escape the coup d'etat and the many attempts on my life thanks to the loyalty of most of my guards, who refused to turn the cloak to [FromFrom.GetTitledName] and protected me in the direst stages of the ordeal.
Time to strike back!
I was miraculously able to escape the assassination attempt on my life thanks to the swiftness of my guards, who arrived just in time to save me from the hooded figure who was trying to kill me!

I can't be completely sure yet, but it seems that a conspiracy to overthrow [Root.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] is currently in motion. All I miss to piece everything together is the name of the mastermind behind this.
It seems that [From.GetTitledName], [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s spymaster, has found out more than [From.GetSheHe] should have about my conspiracy.
This is unfortunate
[From.GetSheHeCap] needs to die

[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s realm is in a state of regency, and the current regent is not remotely as powerful nor as influential as I am. With the silent support of my conspiracy backers, I could addempt taking it for myself!
There's no time to lose
I don't think this is the right path
[From.GetTitledName] is attempting to take the regency!
[From.GetSheHeCap] must have strong backers!
The regency is mine!
A bright day
Your attempt to take the regency ended in an utter failure!
It won't stop me
[FromFrom.GetTitledName] unsuccesfully attempted to steal the regency from you!
[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] must be mad!
With a swift diplomatic move, [FromFrom.GetTitledName] took the regency from you!
[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] must have had powerful backers!

As regent of the realm, my conspiracy to acquire the [Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullBaseName] is stronger than ever. The ruler is too young to interfere, and with the right move I could put my hands on the crown!
And thus I clothe my naked villainy
We go to use our hands, and not our tongues

I will never be able to take the [Root.PlotTargetTitle.GetFullBaseName] from [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] with [Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] mother's family in such an influential position at court. Something needs to be done.
Have the mother imprisoned
Have the mother and her family imprisoned
We needn't be so blunt
[From.GetTitledName]'s guards are at the door! They want to imprison me!
I won't be taken so easily

Your guards' attempt to imprison [From.GetTitledName] failed! [From.GetSheHeCap] was somehow able to escape [From.GetHerHis] chambers as soon as [From.GetSheHe] heard my men coming for [From.GetHerHim].
Alas!
[From.GetTitledName] is safely locked in the dungeons of your castle. [From.GetSheHeCap] was (falsely) accused of plotting against the realm and the murder of its regent, [Root.GetTitledName].
Say, have I thy consent that [From.GetSheHe] shall die?
Brilliant

[From.GetTitledName] had you falsely tried for treason committed against the realm because of your alleged role in a conspiracy to assassinate [From.GetHerHim]. You have been sentenced to death and are now awaiting execution!
O bloody [From.GetTitledName]!
[From.GetTitledName] has been tried and executed for treason committed against the realm because of [From.GetHerHis] alleged role in a conspiracy to assassinate its regent!
I hope [FromFrom.GetTitledName] is speaking the truth
Now that the Queen Mother is not an obstacle anymore, I can focus on what to do with [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] and [Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] male siblings.
Have [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] imprisoned
[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] and [Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] brothers imprisoned
This is too risky
[From.GetTitledName]'s guards are taking me to the castle tower!
What does this mean?
[From.GetTitledName] is now locked in the dungeons.
Shall I be plain? I wish the bastards dead, and I would have it suddenly performed!
There will be no more blood on the path to the throne
[From.GetSheHe]'s safe there
Get rid of [From.GetHerHim]
[From.GetTitledName] had you executed because of the threat you represented to the legitimacy of [From.GetHerHis] claim.
So wise, so young, they say, do never live long
[From.GetTitledName] had you executed to clear [From.GetHerHis] path and is now attempting to seize the throne!
So wise, so young, they say, do never live long
With your life and freedom in [From.GetHerHis] hands now, [From.GetTitledName] is now attempting to seize the throne!
Argh!
Failure! After [From.GetTitledName]'s execution, my attempt to seize the throne was everted by the vassals still loyal to [From.GetHerHim].
What is done cannot be now amended
Victory! After [From.GetTitledName]'s execution, there were no more obstacles on the path to the throne!
But shall we wear these glories for a day? Or shall they last, and we rejoice in them?

Failure! After sparing [From.GetTitledName], my attempt to seize the throne was everted by the vassals still loyal to [From.GetHerHim], who were able to set [From.GetHerHim] free and are now at war with me together with [From.GetHerHim]!
What is done cannot be now amended
Victory! With [From.GetTitledName] safely locked up in my dungeon, there were no obstacles on the path to the throne!
But shall we wear these glories for a day? Or shall they last, and we rejoice in them?
[From.GetTitledName]'s attempt to seize the throne failed, and your loyal vassals were able to set you free during the confrontation that took place in the aftermath.
I'll face the traitor in battle!
Inform [From.GetTitledName] of your consent in being part of [From.GetHerHis] plan
Ask [From.GetTitledName] for a higher compensation for your role
[From.GetTitledName] will be very disappointed of hearing of my rejection
Ask [From.GetTitledName] for a title as compensation for your role
Send your men to assassinate [This.GetTitledFirstName]
Send your men to assassinate [This.GetTitledFirstName] and let the blame fall on [This.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]
Have your and the marshal's men assault the capital, take its castle and attempt to capture [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] in order to usurp the throne!
Have your and the marshal's men assault the capital, take its castle and attempt to assassinate [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] in order to usurp the throne!
Have your and the marshal's men take the capital and usurp the throne!

You have learned from your informants in the council that [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s daughter in law might be having an affair with a courtier. If words of this were to reach [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s ears, there would be no mercy for her nor for her lover.
This could prove to be useful
I don't mind for such trifles
Send [Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName] an anonymous missive revealing the affair
I just received a very worrying anonymous letter, describing in detail an affair between my daughter in law and a nobleman of the realm.
This is lese-majesty!
No one needs to know this..
My wife [Root.Spouse.GetFirstName] has just been arrested together with [From.Lover.GetBestName] for high treason and lese-majesty because of having an affair with him!
And I didn't know anything of this!
You have just been arrested together with your lover, [Root.Lover.GetBestName], for high treason and lese-majesty!
I beg forgiveness!
[From.GetTitledName] is now safely locked up in your dungeons, awaiting trial for [From.GetHerHis] accusations of high treason and lese-majesty.
[From.GetSheHeCap] will have [From.GetHerHis] life safe
Off with [From.GetHerHis] head!
You have just been sentenced to death for high treason and lese-majesty, and are now awaiting to be executed on the orders of [From.GetTitledName].
Your wife, [From.GetTitledName], has been sentenced to death and executed for the crimes of high treason and lese-majesty.
The whore!

[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s heir is very skilled and well loved by the subjects of the realm. This could represent an obstacle for my conspiracy to overthrow [Root.PlotTarget.GetObjectPronoun], if [Root.PlotTarget.GetSubjectPronoun] was to die prematurely and the throne pass onto [Root.PlotTarget.GetPossPronoun] heir.
Something needs to be done about it
I need to follow another path
[Root.PlotTarget.GetTitledName]'s heir is very fond of wine and rides in the countryside. If we are to strike, we have to use his weaknesses against him.
I will have him poisoned
I know of another way..
I don't think this is a good idea after all
I've been promised a title for my role in the recent conspiracy.
A debt that needs to be paid
I dare not ask
[From.GetTitledFirstName] just reminded me of the title I've promised [From.GetHerHim] because of [From.GetHerHis] pivotal role in my recent conspiracy.
[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]s always pay their debts
What title? I can't remember
Will no one rid me of [From.GetHerHim]?
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has granted you a title and the same status you held prior to the conspiracy!
The end justifies the means
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has refused to give you the title that [From.GetSheHe] promised you!
The traitor!
Vengeance is in my heart, death in my hand, blood and revenge are hammering in my head.
I will have my revenge

A bishop subject of mine is far too ambitious for his own good. His talks of God and his love are ruining all the good things we have built in those years, and sensibly weakening my rule and my status..
Will no one rid me of this turbulent priest?
He's a man of God
[From.GetTitledFirstName]'s knights have come for me!
For the name of Jesus, I am ready to embrace death

The wicked knight leapt suddenly upon [From.GetTitledFirstName], cutting off the top of the crown which the unction of sacred chrism had dedicated to God. Next he received a second blow on the head, but still he stood firm and immovable. At the third blow he fell on his knees and elbows, offering himself a living sacrifice, and saying in a low voice, 'For the name of Jesus and the protection of the Church, I am ready to embrace death'...
I didn't mean THAT
We started early, the sun had barely risen above the horizon. There was plenty of prey, the dogs caught many rabbits and I slayed one great boar before he killed my horse and myself.
column3: Nous avons commencé tôt, le soleil venait à peine de percer l'horizon. Les proies abondaient, les chiens ont pris de nombreux lapins et j'ai occis un sanglier avant qu'il ne tue mon cheval et moi-même.
column4: Wir fingen früh an, die Sonne hatte sich über dem Horizont kaum erhoben. Es gab viel Beute, die Hunde fingen viele Kaninchen und ich tötete einen großen Eber, bevor er mein Pferd und mich selbst tötete.

column2: I'm a hunter
column3: Je suis un(e) chasseur(se)
column4: Ich bin ein Jäger

column2: The new bird is almost too perfect. I enjoy every hunt with her, and the cook has trouble finding new recipes for rabbit.
column3: Le nouvel oiseau est presque trop parfait. J'éprouve une grande joie à chaque chasse avec lui et le cuisinier à du mal à trouver de nouveaux récipients pour conserver les lapins.
column4: Der neue Vogel ist fast zu vollkommen. Ich genieße jede Jagd mit ihm, und der Koch hat Schwierigkeiten, neue Rezepte für das Kaninchen zu finden.

column2: I'm a falconer
column3: Je suis un(e) fauconnier(ière)
column4: Ich bin ein Falkner

column2: I'm never happier than when I'm in my study, poring over some newly imported volume. Books are truly God's greatest gift to man.
column3: Je ne suis jamais aussi heureux que lorsque je suis à mon étude, étudiant de près quelques nouveaux manuscrits importés. Les livres sont vraiment les plus cadeaux que Dieu à fait aux hommes.
column4: Ich bin nie glücklicher wenn ich über einem kürzlich importierten Buch brüte. Bücher sind wahrhaft das größte Geschenk Gottes, des Allmächtigen.

column2: I'm a scholar
column3: Je suis un(e) lettré(e)
column4: Ich bin ein Schüler

column2: I found the strange book collecting dust in a forgotten corner of the castle library. It took me several weeks of intense study before its mystery revealed itself to me. The gibberish parts was encoded and after many hours trying to decipher I managed to break it and construct a key to make it easier for me to read. Its mystery is still not solved...
column3: J'ai trouvé ce livre poussiéreux dans un coin perdu de la bibliothèque du château. Cela m'a pris plusieurs semaines d'intenses études avant que je puisse percer son mystère. Les parties pleines de charabia étaient en réalité codées. Après maintes heures et tentatives pour les déchiffrer j'ai réussi à m'en défaire et à fabriquer une clé me permettant de lire plus facilement. Son mystère n'est toujours pas résolu....
column4: Ich fand das fremde Buch, das Staub an einer vergessenen Ecke der Schlossbibliothek sammelt. Ich brauchte mehrere Wochen der intensiven Studie, bevor sein Mysterium sich zu mir offenbarte. Die Kauderwelsch-Teile wurden verschlüsselt und nach vielen Stunden versuchend zu entziffern ich schaffte, es zu brechen und einen Schlüssel zu bauen, es leichter für mich zu machen, zu lesen. Sein Mysterium wird noch immer nicht gelöst...

column2: I'm a mystic
column3: Je suis un mystique
column4: Ich bin ein Mystiker

column2: My regular excursions into the dungeon have only served to whet my appetite. I have sent for a skilled torturer who will teach me more about the arts of pain.
column3: Mes excursions régulières dans le donjon ont seulement servis à aiguiser mon appétit. J'ai envoyé chercher un bourreau talentueux qui m'en apprendra plus sur l'art de la douleur.
column4: Meine regelmäßigen Ausflüge in den Kerker haben nur meinem Verlangen nach mehr gedient. Ich habe nach einem Fachpeiniger geschickt, der mich mehr über die Künste des Schmerzes lehren wird.

column2: I'm an impaler
column3: Je suis un empaleur
column4: Ich bin ein Pfähler

column2: My garden is the apple of my eye, my pride and joy. I distrust my gardener and would spend every hour of the day in my garden if I could.
column3: Mon jardin est la prune de mes yeux, ma fierté et ma joie. Je me méfie de mon jardinier et passerais ma vie dans mon jardin si je pouvais.
column4: Mein Garten ist wie mein Augapfel, mein Stolz und meine Heiterkeit. Ich misstraue meinem Gärtner und würde jede Stunde des Tages in meinem Garten verbringen, wenn ich könnte.

column2: I'm a gardener
column3: Je suis un jardinier
column4: Ich bin ein Gärtner

column2: My modest attempts to write poetry were never meant to be published in any way, but wherever I go, bards and minstrels are reciting or singing my poems.
column3: Mes modestes tentatives pour écrire de la poésies n'ont jamais été publiées, mais où que j'ailles, bardes et menestrels récitent mes poèmes.
column4: Meine bescheidenen Versuche, Gedichte zu schreiben, waren nie dazu gedacht veröffentlicht zu werden, aber wohin auch immer ich gehe, rezitieren Barden und Minnesänger  meine Gedichte

column2: I'm a poet
column3: Je suis un poète
column4: Ich bin ein Poet

column2: After a long time of contemplation and soul-searching it feels as if I could bear to live in complete celibacy for the rest of my life.
column3: Après un long moment de contemplation et de retour sur moi-même il semble que je puisse vivre dans un célibat complet jusqu'à la fin de mes jours.
column4: Nach einer langen Zeit des Nachdenkens und der Gewissenserforschung fühlt es sich, als ob ich die Last des Zölibat den Rest meines Lebens ertragen könnte.

column2: I'm celibate
column3: Je suis célibataire
column4: Ich lebe im Zölibat.

column2: This lifestyle of utmost pleasure and joyous life suits me perfectly. This can be nothing but heaven.
column3: Ce mode de vie plein de plaisirs extr^mes et et de joie de vivre me convient parfaitement. Ce ne peut être rien d'autre que le paradis.
column4: Dieser Lebensstil aud purem Vergnügens und freudigen Lebens passt mir vollkommen. Das kann nur der Himmel sein.

column2: I'm a hedonist
column3: Je suis un hédoniste
column4: Ich bin ein Hedonist

column2: The duel was close fought, but in the end I was victorious over my opponent. As I basked in the admiration of my peers, I knew that I had to do this again.
column3: Le duel fut un combat serré et acharné, mais à la fin je parvint à triompher de mon adversaire. Après m'être enivré de l'admiration de mes pairs, j'ai su que je devais le refaire.
column4: Das Duell war knapp erkämpft, aber schließlich war ich über meinen Gegner siegreich. Als ich mich in der Bewunderung unter meine Gleichen sonnte, wusste ich, dass ich das wieder tun musste.

column2: I'm a duelist
column3: Je suis un duéliste
column4: Ich bin ein Duellant

column2: I have finally become an expert in Islamic jurisprudence! My knowledge of the Qur'an, the Sunnah, Ijma' (Consensus) and Qiyas (Analogy) is what makes me a faqih and I will use that knowledge to be a better [Root.GetTitle] and ruler of my people.
column3: Je suis enfin devenu un expert en jurisprudence islamique ! Ma connaissance du Coran, de la sunna, de l’ijmâ‘ (le consensus) et de la qiyâs (l’analogie) font de moi un faqîh. J’emploierais mon savoir pour devenir un meilleur [Root.GetTitle] et guide pour mon peuple.
column4: Ich bin endlich ein Experte des islamischen Rechts! Mein Wissen um den Qur'an, die Sunna, Idschma (Konsens) und Qiyas (Analogie) macht mich zu einem Faqih und ich werde dieses Wissen nutzen, um ein besserer [Root.GetTitle] und Herrscher zu sein.

column2: I am proud to have become a faqih!
column3: Je suis fier d’être devenu un faqîh !
column4: Ich bin stolz darauf, ein Faqih geworden zu sein!

column2: That lifestyle is not for me
column4: Diese Lebensweise ist nichts für mich

column2: [From.GetTitledName] has consented to attend the commendation ceremony and hence swear fealty to your noble and enlightened rule!
This is good

My daughter, [From.GetTitledFirstName], just got married to [From.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName]. It is now my duty as a father to provide him with an adequate dowry.
He will have an adequate dowry
This is what I can spare..
He will have an adequate dowry
He will have a rich dowry
He will have a landed dowry
My father in law, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has provided me with an adequate dowry for marrying [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName].
An ancient custom
My father in law, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has provided me with a rather poor dowry for marrying [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName].
The cheap bastard!
My father in law, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has provided me with an adequate dowry for marrying [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName].
An ancient custom
My father in law, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has provided me with a rich dowry for marrying [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName].
I knew she was a good pick
My father in law, [From.GetTitledFirstName], has provided me with a very rich dowry consisting in gold and a title for marrying [Root.Spouse.GetTitledFirstName].
I knew she was a great choice!

My way of life is fallen into the sear, the yellow leaf, and that which should accompany old age as honor, love, obedience, troops of friends, I must not look to have. But in their stead curses not loud, but deep, mouth-honor breath which the poor heart would fain deny, and dare not.
An old man is twice a child
The rebels in $PROVINCENAME$ have appointed a local noble as their leader and are now marching for their independence!
We'll meet on the battlefield!

One of my fellow raiders has come to be a great companion. We have raided and pillaged together, we have slain many a man in battle side by side and feasted together in celebration of a reaving well done, in the true spirit of the Old Gods.
We shall remember this time

With an effective decree, you were able to allow the possibility to have a seniority or a primogeniture succession law into the code of laws of your realm. This will be considered as a milestone for the people of your religion and culture, who will now consider having those laws as well.

With a reformation that will trace the line for the Tengric people, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has introduced the possibility to have a seniority or a primogeniture succession law into the code of laws of [From.GetHerHis] realm.

With a reformation that will trace the line for the Nordic Pagans, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has introduced the possibility to have a seniority or a primogeniture succession law into the code of laws of [From.GetHerHis] realm.

With a reformation that will trace the line for the Baltic Pagans, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has introduced the possibility to have a seniority or a primogeniture succession law into the code of laws of [From.GetHerHis] realm.

With a reformation that will trace the line for the Celts, [From.GetTitledFirstName] has introduced the possibility to have a seniority or a primogeniture succession law into the code of laws of [From.GetHerHis] realm.
[Root.GetChancellorName] Discovered

I have been sent to [From.Location.GetName] to secretly create unrest between the local nobles and their peers, but it seems that at least one of them has seen my real motive and I fear he might inform his liege about this, or even imprison me!.
Most worrisome...
A noble in [Root.Location.GetName] reacts

It seems that the [Root.GetChancellorName] of [From.Host.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [From.GetTitledName], has been hard at work in [From.Location.GetName] trying to spread unrest among us local nobles and turn us against my liege [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] and my peers. What should I do about this troublesome character?
Imprison [From.GetHerHim]!
This is [From.GetHerHis] liege's doing!
[From.GetTitledName] completely overreacted to my most innocent visit to [From.Location.GetName] and decided to imprison me!
What will become of me now?

My lord, your [Root.GetChancellorName] [FromFrom.GetTitledName] has been trying to create unrest among the nobles in [From.Location.GetName] and tried to encourage me to turn against my peers! This shameless act can not go unpunished and to stop further interference I have thus decided to imprison your [Root.GetChancellorName] for an indefinite period of time.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Outrages!

My liege, I discovered that the [Root.GetChancellorName] of [FromFrom.Liege.GetTitledName] has been agitating in [From.Location.GetName], trying to turn us local nobles against you and your vassals. Rest assure that his poisonous word has had no effect on me, and to make sure no more harm is done, I have imprisoned him.

Your humble Vassal,
[From.GetTitledName]
[FromFrom.Liege.GetTitledName] will hear about this!

My liege, I discovered that the [Root.GetChancellorName] of [FromFrom.Liege.GetTitledName] has been agitating in [From.Location.GetName], trying to turn us local nobles against you. Rest assure that his poisonous word has had no effect on me.

Your humble Vassal,
[From.GetTitledName]
[FromFrom.Liege.GetTitledName] will hear about this!

My lord, your [Root.GetChancellorName] [FromFrom.GetTitledName] has been trying to create unrest among the nobles in [From.Location.GetName] and tried to encourage me to turn against my liege [From.Liege.GetTitledName] and my peers! He failed miserably and I can assure you that this shameless act will not go by without consequences.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
This is not good...

I have received word that your [Root.GetChancellorName] was trying to agitate the nobles of my realm by spreading lies about me and my vassals in [FromFrom.Location.GetName]! Rest assure that this outrageous behaviour will not stand!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
Not what I had planned...
Vassal-Liege Opinion Lowered
It took all my skill and charm to sow distrust between the nobles of [Root.Location.GetName] and their peers, but at last their relations lay in ruins.
This should please my liege!
A letter is sent to my liege
At first I could not believe it, but [From.GetTitledName] persisted and showed irrefutable evidence that my peers distrust and despise me!
What an insult!
Send an angry letter to [Root.Liege.GetTitledName]
[From.GetTitledName] accused me of distrusting him and claimed to have evidence of my betrayal! I don't know where he have gotten these ideas from.
What an idiot!

My liege, I have managed to sow distrust between [From.GetTitledName] and [From.GetHerHis] liege [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetHerHis] peers . I hope this pleases you.

Your humble [Root.GetChancellorName],
[Root.job_chancellor.GetTitledName]
Fantastic!

One of the eunuchs at the court has distinguished himself and caught the attention of your advisors. Though they are usually of the jealous kind and loathe to admit redeeming qualities in others, even they cannot deny the promise of this young man.

The Holy Roman Empire, has somehow managed to reclaim enough lost territory to declare the Roman Empire restored! It can no longer be denied that they are the true successors of Rome and its glorious legacy. They claim a new era is upon us.
the Pope will receive your request

I have been giving some tought to your request about the founding of a new Holy Order, and I think that at the moment there is no need for such things. I hope you won't take this matter too personally, yours [From.GetTitledName]

I have been giving some tought to your request about the founding of a new Holy Order, and I think that with the infidels running so strong you couldn't have chosen a better moment for such a suggestion. Together, we will spread the word of the Lord. Yours [From.GetTitledName]

With the authority bestowed on me by His Holyness the Pope himself, I officially declare the estabilishment of the Order of Santiago. The order will receive the county of Santiago and will loyally serve the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName], united in the fight against the infidels. May we Christianize the whole world one day!
the Order will be officially estabilished

[From.GetBestName] has estabilished the Order of Santiago. The new Order will be based at the castle of Santiago and serve the Catholic faith united under the banners of the [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].
